text: Gi tenetene i mua Dimaadua, ngaadahi mo godou dama, godou gau hai hegau, digau Levi, digau henua gee, nia dama guu mmade nadau maadua, mo nia ahina guu mmade nadau lodo ala e noho i godou waahale. Deenei di godou hai e hai i di gowaa a Dimaadua dela ga hilihili belee hai di gowaa e hagalaamua ai dono ingoo.
